```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
#Download and extract source data from zip archive.
download.file(url = "http://p8105.com/data/hw5_data.zip", 
              destfile =  "hw5_data.zip")
dir.create("data") #create a data directory.
unzip(zipfile = "hw5_data.zip", exdir = "data") #extract the files into this new directory
study_data <-
  list.files("./data/data/",pattern = "^.*\\.csv$", full.names = T) %>% 
   map_df(., read_csv)
```
